lines.text: Let's see what the tea leaves say about you... there's a trick my grandmother taught me; she learned it from an old witch in Ireland.
And so you've been drinking coffee ever since.
Ellen, you'd better go now. You're not safe with me. Do you understand?
Suppose I don't want to be safe?
Lightning can strike in the same place twice but not six times.
You think Jeff burnt down his own house and poisoned his own dog? That's impossible, no man in his right mi...
That's right, no man in his *right* mind would do that.
